settings.title: The Perfect Shorts.
settings.text:
So how do we know we’ve made the perfect Shorts? Because we know exactly what makes a bad pair of Shorts.

Shorts that don’t put comfort first. Shorts that aren’t durable. Shorts that cost twice the price because of the little badge on the back pocket, or because they came from a retail store with lighting like a hospital waiting room. 

Frankster has righted these wrongs – and many more. How do we improve on perfection? We make more of it. Keep an eye out for our ever-expanding range of colours and styles.

settings.title: Shorts That Care.
settings.text:
Let’s be real – we’re not going to solve all of the world’s problems with Shorts. But at the very least, we can do our part by not making things worse. So what does that look like for Frankster?

Well, to start with, we like to keep it local. We make locally designed, ethically sourced Shorts. We go to every length to reduce waste and run a sustainable business that’s good for you, good for us, and good for the planet. 

We like to tie all of this together in a neat little bow that we call Slow Fashion. We take it steady and we do things right.

settings.title: Everything You Need. Nothing You Don’t.
settings.text:
Slip into our Shorts and let the day take you wherever it may. They come with a fit that's snug enough for the good times and pockets deeper than a late-night chat at your local.

Whether you're toasting to the sunset or chasing whatever you might find at a bar, Frankster has your back... and your front.
